title: Consultancy Services
text:
Dr. Declan King offers strategic advisory services for pharmaceutical, biotech, and academic partners. Leveraging 20+ years of research leadership, he provides specialized guidance on de-risking neurodegenerative pipelines through advanced biomarker integration and translational study design.
Engagements are tailored to project scope and specific development milestones.
Areas of Engagement:


Translational Biomarker Strategy
Strategic guidance on the selection and validation of synaptic biomarkers (such as SV2A PET) for Phase I/II neurodegeneration programs. I help sponsors establish objective evidence of target engagement.


Synaptic Resilience & Study Design
Advisory on the design and interpretation of studies investigating synaptic preservation. I provide expertise in bridging post-mortem molecular data with in-vivo imaging endpoints to de-risk drug development.


Scientific Advisory & Peer Review
High-level consultancy for research project planning, trial methodology, and publication strategy, leveraging 20+ years of academic and industry-facing research experience.



Ready to integrate advanced synaptic biomarkers into your next program? Contact Dr. Declan King to discuss your project requirements and receive a tailored technical proposal.
Professional Disclaimer Dr. Declan King provides strategic neuroscience consultancy and research advisory services only. All insights and deliverables are intended for informational and research purposes and do not constitute medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Engagement terms and investment are determined by project scope and technical complexity.

title: About Us
text:
King’s Neuro Consultants brings together specialist neurological care and advanced neuroscience research to provide patients and families with clear, evidence-based insight into neurological health. Our approach combines clinical excellence, scientific rigour, and accessible communication to ensure patients feel informed, supported, and confident in their care.








Specialist Private Neurology – Cork
Dr. Hatice King is a highly accomplished Consultant Neurologist who graduated with distinction from Istanbul University. After completing her specialist neurology training in 2018, she was awarded a prestigious research fellowship by the European Academy of Neurology.
With a background in advanced research at the University of Edinburgh and senior clinical roles in major UK-wide Motor Neuron Disease (MND) clinical trials, Dr. King brings world-class academic expertise to private clinical practice.

Specialist Clinical Expertise


Headache & Migraine: Specialist management of chronic headaches and modern treatment options.
Multiple Sclerosis (MS): Comprehensive care and the latest disease-modifying strategies.
Epilepsy & Seizure Management: Expert diagnostic review and long-term management.
Stroke & TIA: Rapid assessment and secondary prevention strategies.
Functional Neurological Disorder (FND): Compassionate, specialist-led diagnostic pathways.
General Neurology: Expert consultation for Parkinson’s, tremors, and unexplained symptoms.






Research & Consultancy






Neuroscience Researcher & Consultant
Strategic Expertise in Synaptic Biomarkers & Neurodegenerative Disease
Dr. Declan King brings over 20 years of research leadership from the University of Edinburgh, specializing in the intersection of synaptic resilience and molecular pathology. His career is defined by high-impact collaborations with global pharmaceutical leaders, the National Institutes of Health (NIH), and the FNIH (Foundation for the NIH) focusing on the validation of biomarkers that drive clinical success.
Core Expertise & Impact:

Translational Biomarker Innovation: Played a pivotal role in establishing SV2A PET imaging as a validated biomarker for synaptic density, a breakthrough that directly supports target engagement and patient stratification in disease-modifying clinical trials for Alzheimer’s.

Synaptic Resilience Research: Extensive experience investigating the molecular architecture of the “resilient brain,” providing unique insights into how synaptic composition protects against cognitive decline in ageing and neurodegeneration.

Multimodal Research Leadership: Author of over 25 peer-reviewed publications utilizing post-mortem human tissue, animal models, and advanced molecular imaging to bridge the gap between bench and clinic.

Dr. Declan King provides consultancy services related to neuroscience research, biomarker development, and healthy ageing studies. He does not provide medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment.







By combining expert clinical care with cutting-edge neuroscience research, King’s Neuro Consultants offers patients and clients a uniquely informed perspective on neurological health — grounded in evidence, clarity, and compassion.
Medical advice, diagnosis, and treatment are provided solely by a qualified medical professional.

title: Patient Services
text:
Dr. Hatice King offers specialist neurology consultations for new and follow-up patients.
Appointments are delivered with care, clarity, and evidence-based guidance.
Below are the main services offered.


New Consultant Appointment
Comprehensive initial neurological assessment, including review of previous investigations and development of a personalised management plan.
€300


Follow-up Appointment – In person
Review of symptoms, investigations, and treatment progress, with clear guidance on next steps and ongoing care.
€180


Follow-up Appointment – Phone
Convenient telephone consultation for suitable follow-ups, particularly helpful for patients living further away.
€120



For patients travelling long distances, a phone follow-up can be arranged after an initial in-person consultation where appropriate.
